thread.title_full: Semiconductor Production Equipment Market in Taiwan 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review

author: admin
title: Semiconductor Production Equipment Market in Taiwan 2015-2019 - Reportlinker Review
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 1:44 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ReportLinker 
NEW YORK, Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- About semiconductor production equipment market in TaiwanThe semiconductor industry in Taiwan has witnessed a rapid growth because of an aggressive investment by private companies. The semiconductor production equipment market is a vital part of the semiconductor market, with semiconductor chip makers investing about 20% of their revenue in procuring manufacturing equipment. Semiconductor production equipment involves cutting-edge manufacturing technologies, which have short development cycles. Semiconductor equipment is an aggregate of various advanced technologies such as mechatronics, super-precision processing, and extreme environmental. This industry has an enormous impact on other industries such as aerospace, defense, precision mechanics, ground vehicles, and medical instruments.Technavio's analysts forecast the semiconductor production equipment market in Taiwan to grow at a CAGR of 9.2% over the period 2015-2019.Covered in this ReportThe report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of semiconductor production equipment market in Taiwan 2015-2019.To calculate the market size, the report considers revenue generated from the sales of semiconductor production equipment. It also considers the sales generated by wafer processing, assembly and packaging, test, and other front-end and back-end equipment. Other front-end includes wafer manufacturing, mask/reticle manufacturing, and fab facilities equipment. The report does not take into consideration aftermarket sales or the revenue generated from repairs and servicing of semiconductor production equipment. Technavio's report, Semiconductor Production Equipment Market in Taiwan 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report also discusses the major drivers that influence the growth of the market. In addition, it outlines the challenges faced by the vendors and the market at large, as well as the key trends that are emerging in the market. Key vendors
